transcript:
Customer: [inaudible] kya?
Customer: Kya bol rahe hai sir?

Executive: Hello.
Executive: Good morning Ravindra sir, Ratna baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji bataye Ratna ji.
Executive: Sir woh aapka ek concern open hua hai kal mail ke through usi ke regarding baat karna tha.
Customer: Bataye.
Executive: Leads ko leke ki sir kaha kya problem aa rahi hai. Actually maine us din aapko call kiya tha na toh apne Lucknow call ki call ki.
Customer: Kya hai na aapke yaha IndiaMART.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Jab renewal aa jata hai aapko us din bhi yahi shabd bataye the aap guideline pe le lijiye aap aage bhi follow up kar sakte hai. Jab renewal aata hai tab hume aata chakki plant ke dhadhadhad lead milti hai badhiya se kaam hota hai do teen mahine toh achha kaam hota hai.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Aur jab renewal ho jata hai toh iske baad aap log anas sanas ke humko dekh lijiye hamara khol lijiye aap aur dekhiye kaun si lead aap provide kar rahe hai humko. Hume sirf aata chakki plant aur floor mill plant ka chahiye.
Customer: Lekin itna pata nahi kaun kaun se product hai jiska naam bhi mai nahi jaanta woh usme aa rahe hai na. Dusri cheez dusri cheez yearly by lead aap is baar humko nahi mili jo 150 milti thi.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Aapne renewal kar diya yearly by lead pichli baar bhi mili thi humko 150 kareeb.
Customer: Yearly by lead is baar hume nahi mili hai.
Executive: Woh jo non-lapsable by lead hoti hai sir woh us time pe offer bhi rahi hogi isliye aapko mil gayi hogi. Is baar nahi thi toh isliye nahi mili.
Executive: Woh hosting ke time pe aapko kisi ne offer ki hogi.
Customer: Nahi offer nahi kiya tha kisi ne woh sirf ye tha ki is product mein itna by lead aapko salana wala ikattha rahega itna milega.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir aisa kuch specific nahi hota jo aapki by lead daily bonus weekly hoti hai na wahi hoti hai. Woh us time pe kisi ne aapko aapke jo account manager rahe honge ya unke senior unhone aapko offer kiya gaya hoga. Woh apne side se bhi unhone offer kiya hoga aisa kuch raha hoga.
Executive: But ye abhi available hai nahi isliye hum de nahi paye.
Customer: Dekh lijiye. Aapko cashback mila tha na sir is baar cashback provide kiya gaya tha.
Customer: Nahi cashback kya aapne diya tha usko nahi jaante.
Executive: Sir woh 10% aapka cashback diya tha aap uske liye hota hai 10% jo aapka aapne pay kiya tha uska cashback 6 mahine tak valid hota hai.
Customer: Ab us tarah se jo aapne payment kaha humne payment dala hai usme kaun sa cashback mila hai.
Executive: Sir aap by lead le sakte hai na usse.
Customer: Nahi mila kya aapne humko kaha wapas diya 10%.
Executive: Sir woh aapke wallet matlab IndiaMART ke hi usme hota hai generate hoke jab bhi aapko IndiaMART se 6 mahine ke andar koi lead ki zarurat hoti hai toh aap usse purchase kar sakte hai ya koi other service lete hai toh woh aapka usme redeem ho jayega.
Customer: Nahi madam woh redeem wala kaam na karaki aap upar mail wol karke aap mera jo bhi aapko by lead deni ho woh cheez aap humko de dijiye yearly wale mein. Kyuki woh 10% ka hum cash ha cashback wala mere samajh se bahar hai kul milake aap isi mein kar dijiyega toh hum apna sahi kuch by lead hoti hai jis din hamari by lead khatam hoti hai pata lage nahi utha paate hum.
Executive: Theek hai sir.
Customer: Dusri cheez ab floor mill plant ka jaise hi aata hai aap samjhiye hamari baat jaise aata hai waise turant expire ho jata hai. Hum click kiye nahi ki expire hua.
Executive: Sir aap filter out kiya kijiye.
Customer: Ab mai jaanti hu sir dekhiye aap visit karte rehte hai na toh har time mera bhi phone karna hi sahi nahi hota aapne us din kaha Lucknow mai ja raha hu toh mai bhi baar baar karna bhi mera sahi nahi hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Toh isliye kya hai.
Customer: Lekin isme thoda sa sudhar sudhar aap kara dijiye isko. Karan ye hai ki ab hum kaam hum wahi paisa lagaye aur kaam bhi na ho toh usse.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Mera system toh kharab hi ho raha hai mai aapka bhi kar raha hu bhai yaha theek hai ab kaam aapke yaha se kaam nahi mil pa raha humko.
Executive: Sir kaam aisa nahi hai ki nahi hai bas mai aapse request kar rahi hu jo aapko wrong leads aa rahi hai woh aap delete kar dijiye.
Customer: Woh toh wrong lead delete karte chal rahe hai hum delete karte chal rahe hai.
Executive: Setting section mein bhi dal diya kijiye sir.
Customer: Ab wahi hum setting section leke hum jo aata hai usko hum delete kar rahe hai iske baad bhi woh baar baar punah generate ho rahi hai fir fir se generate ho rahi hai.
Executive: Mai keyword check karti hu ki kaun sa keyword aisa kuch hai jo incorrect hai. Dusra ye cheez ki koi bhi lead hai na sir us koshish kijiye ki aap 4 ghante ke andar hi consume kare. Matlab recent lead hi uthaye uthaiye kyuki purani lead uthayenge.
Customer: Lead uthate uthate khatam ho jati hai ab yahi toh bata rahe hai aap se na. Jaise lead aayi hamare agal bagal ki UP ki.
Customer: Hum us par click karna chahe click karte karte woh khatam ho jati.
Executive: Achha expire ho jati hai.
Customer: Ab ye cheez agar aapke senior ha aapke senior se baat hogi toh batayenge ki aapke yaha star hai 10 log hai paanch log hai toh usme chali jati woh log pehle utha lete hai. Lekin aisa nahi hai suniye pehle ye cheez nahi nahi suniye toh yahi kai baar pichli baar bhi yahi kahani thi.
Executive: Aisa kuch nahi hai.
Customer: Toh hum jab ab yahi jab do teen mahina rah jata hai toh lead kahe padi rahti hai humko kahe mil jati. Ab is baar kyu nahi mil rahi pehle ye uthaiye.
Executive: Sir thoda sa dekhiye competition mein.
Customer: Matlab second second nahi lagta nahi competitor hai competitor hai aapka message gira nahi ki humne click hum bhi usi pe dekhte baithe rehte hai.
Customer: Lekin jab click karte karte woh khatam.
Executive: La matlab yahi hai ki bahut tez expire ho jati hai ab yahi.
Customer: Haan tez expire hoti hai lekin ye 10 mahina hogi madam do mahina fir nahi hogi jab humko renewal karana hoga bilkul nahi hogi padi rahti hai teen teen mahine padi rahti hai.
Executive: Ji hai na sir ki lead hum bana rahe hai woh toh match speaking ke through aata hai.
Customer: Buyer ne dala consume kiya dekh lijiye kaha kaha se kami hai dekhiye aap log uska work kar rahe ho. Kaha se kami hai humko bhi rozgar chahiye aap se kuch kaam chahiye isliye hum bhi jude hai. Aap usko dekhiye ki ye kami kaha se aa rahi hai.
Executive: Ji bilkul sahi hai.
Executive: Theek hai mai aapki catalog pe kaam karti hu catalog score thoda increase kar deti hu.
Customer: Hume sirf jo hai sirf aap se floor mill plant aur aata chakki plant do hi keyword chahiye.
Customer: Isi pe aap humko jo de paye dekhiye.
Executive: Toh ye seed cleaning machine sir wheat cleaning machine ye sab bhi toh aapki product ki hai.
Customer: Hai hamari hi main main jo hamare hai aata chakki plant floor mill plant. Yahi aap main mein rakh dijiye baki ha isi pe focus kariye.
Executive: Ji theek hai. Leads aapko iske bhi aayenge dusra abhi grain separator ka bhi aap lead utha rahe hai aur ye aap.
Customer: Ab hum keh rahe hai baat baat nahi samajh rahi hai aap. Jab khane mein kuch nahi milega toh aadmi tikiya samosa kha lega na raste mein.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Ha toh wahi mai kar raha hu jab kuch nahi mil raha hai toh grain separator ka utha le raha hu kahi se kuch mil jaye.
Executive: Toh isko add remove kar de sir.
Customer: Remove kariye isko aap.
Executive: Achha toh fir iski lead mat uthaiyega mai remove kar dungi.
Customer: Nahi bilkul nahi uthayenge fir relevancy aayegi aapko.
Executive: Theek hai sir catalog mai dekhti hu aapka and koi.
Customer: Ha remove kar dijiye aap hume sirf aata chakki plant hi generate kariye bas itna rahane dijiye aur sab remove kar dijiye aap.
Executive: Saare product remove nahi kar sakte sir sirf ek product nahi rakh sakte aapka 48 product hai usme bhi thoda sa hame kaam karna padega. Aap uski lead uthaiye matlab jo aapka primary product hai but aap isko matlab avoid mat kijiyega ispe bhi aap continue kaam karte rahiyega catalog ka kaam score ka kaam mai karti hu sir aapke paas mera number hai aap mujhe time to time khud bhi call kar liya kariye sir kyuki mera har time call karna ki aur aap bahar rahe woh bhi nahi chahiye ki aapka kis specific time pe ya toh mai aapko call karu.
Customer: Chaliye chaliye theek hai lekin aaj aap hamare hamare catalog pe jo bhi aap dekh sake woh dekh lijiye.
Executive: Theek hai sir mai aapka ispe ka ispe kaam karti hu jo bhi aapka concern hai sir aur mere call pe number pe please connect kar lijiyega aap kal agar free hote ek baar fir se toh theek hai sir baki ye concern aapka close kar rahi hu aur kuch product ki details mang rahi hu woh whatsapp pe de dijiye.
Customer: Bilkul bilkul.
Customer: Theek.
Executive: Theek hai sir aur sir feedback jayega aapke mail pe.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving yearly buyleads.

- Receiving irrelevant leads.

- Leads expire too quickly.

- Dissatisfied with cashback process.



Resolution:

- Executive explained yearly buyleads depend on offers.

- Executive offered to check and remove irrelevant keywords.

- Executive suggested consuming leads within 4 hours.

- Executive offered to work on catalog score.

- Agreed to remove grain separator leads.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to provide product details on WhatsApp.

- Executive will work on catalog and remove keywords.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, cashback, catalog, relevancy
